charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. (FELON IN POSSESSION OF FIREARM)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Three Years, with six months served in community confinement and the following six months served in home confinement, during which time defendant may leave for activities approved by his probation officer. On 12/9/2013 was sentenced to 6 months imprisonment. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal.
